content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS rate_code
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        rate_code_id TINYINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(20)
    );

-- json com m√∫ltiplas linhas
SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code_multi_line.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS rate_code
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        rate_code_id TINYINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(20)
    );
